statements: DELETE FROM earthquake_epicenters WHERE id = 1 AND magnitude > 5.0;
DELETE FROM EarthquakeEvents WHERE magnitude > 6.0 AND YEAR(time_stamp) = 2021
DELETE FROM MapVisualizations WHERE visualization_id IN (1, 3, 5)
DELETE FROM earthquakes WHERE type = 'Tectonic' AND depth > 5;
DELETE FROM Earthquakes WHERE magnitude > 7.0 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) < 2000;
DELETE FROM Epicenters WHERE epicenter_depth < 10 OR epicenter_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE magnitude > 5 AND depth < 50;
DELETE FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE id = 100 AND latitude = 34.0522
DELETE FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE magnitude > 5 AND depth < 10
